pullRequest.title: Rntbd added centralized monitoring for RntbdChannelEndpoint
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR moves the monitoring to RntbdClientChannelPoolMonitoringProvider
sample log
2020-09-16 15:50:19,703       [cosmos-rntbd-monitoring-rntbd-endpoints[1]] WARN  com.azure.cosmos.implementation.directconnectivity.rntbd.RntbdServiceEndpoint$RntbdEndpointMonitoringProvider - RntbdEndpoint Identifier [RntbdEndpoint, id 1, remoteAddress cdb-ms-prod-southcentralus1-fd8.documents.azure.com:14048, creationTime 2020-09-16T22:50:12.533437Z, hashCode 1508248836], Stat [ poolTaskExecutorSize 0, lastRequestNanoTime 2020-09-16T22:50:19.694037151Z, connecting 0, acquiredChannel 0, availableChannel 2, pendingAcquisitionSize 9982, closed false ]

commit.message: added centralized monitoring for rntbd channel endpoint
code review comment addressed, moved to Provider
extend auto closable to ensure is free-ed on gc
cleanup removed a method which was not needed
